question:
Consider the following statements about the “Sankalp se Siddhi” (Attainment through Resolve) scheme:
  1. The scheme was launched on the 75th anniversary of Quit India Movement
  2. It is a five-year plan that aims to foster the New India Movement 2017-2022
Which of the above statements is/are correct?
explanation: “Sankalp se Siddhi” (Attainment through Resolve) scheme aims at good governance. This is a five-year plan that aims to foster the New India Movement 2017-2022. The New India Movement 2017-2022 envisages India free from poverty, corruption, terrorism, communalism, casteism & uncleanliness and unite the entire country by adopting good governance and using technology. This scheme was adopted on the 75<sup>th</sup> anniversary of Quit India Movement.
